statements: UPDATE time_logs SET start_time = '08:00:00', end_time = '17:00:00', total_hours = '9 hours' WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE time_logs SET end_time = '16:30:00', total_hours = '8.5 hours', start_time = '08:30:00' WHERE employee_id = '8b35f64a-a7be-467f-a079-8c1f05993784';
UPDATE time_logs SET total_hours = total_hours + INTERVAL '1 hour' WHERE log_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
UPDATE time_logs SET end_time = '10:30' WHERE employee_id = '87654321-4321-1234-4321-987654321098' AND log_date = '2022-01-15'
